page.title: 11MY DAY IN ABINGDON
page.content: In the morning when I wake up there is Kevin,Stuart and Neale, my brothers, and Mum in our house.Dad has already gone to work at Harwell where he is a pipe fitter.I have my breakfast with Kevin and Stuart.Neale, who is only eleven months old,is still in bed.We usually have cerael and a cup of tea,I then go to school with Kevin. After school I go home and Mum, Stuart and Neale are there,then I go out to play with my friends.I come back at 5.00pm and have my tea.Afterwards my Mum goes to work .She works as a cleaner at Culham,from 6.00pm until 8.30pm.When my Mum comes home from work we go upstairs to play,we go to bed at 9.00pm. On Saturdays we go around to our Nan's house.On most Sundays we go to the garden centre at Tesco's store. Written by Joanne Godfrey aged 10 .
